name: Teterboro Airport
description: Teterboro Airport is one of the busiest private aviation airports in the United States, serving the New York metropolitan area. Known for its proximity to Manhattan and excellent FBO facilities.

name: Van Nuys Airport
description: Van Nuys Airport is the world's busiest general aviation airport, serving the Los Angeles area. It's the preferred choice for private aviation in Southern California.

name: Scottsdale Airport
description: Scottsdale Airport serves the Phoenix metropolitan area and is a hub for corporate aviation and private jets visiting Arizona's premier destination.

name: Palm Beach International Airport
description: Palm Beach International serves South Florida's luxury market, with extensive private aviation facilities catering to seasonal jet owners and visitors.

name: Santa Monica Airport
description: Santa Monica Airport is conveniently located near Beverly Hills and downtown Los Angeles, making it ideal for business and leisure travelers.

name: Aspen-Pitkin County Airport
description: Aspen Airport serves one of the most exclusive ski resort destinations, with heavy private jet traffic during winter season.

name: Henderson Executive Airport
description: Henderson Executive Airport is Las Vegas's premier private aviation facility, serving high-net-worth individuals and corporate jets.

name: Miami-Opa Locka Executive Airport
description: Opa-locka Executive Airport is Miami's primary general aviation facility, conveniently located for South Florida and the Caribbean.

name: Westchester County Airport
description: Westchester County Airport serves the northern New York City suburbs and Connecticut, offering a convenient alternative to Teterboro.

name: William P. Hobby Airport
description: Hobby Airport serves Houston's private aviation community with excellent FBO facilities and convenient access to the city center.
